headline: Morgan Stanley Alliance for Children’s Mental Health Marks Five Years with New Grants
summary: NEW YORK, April 07, 2025--Morgan Stanley today announced $15 million in new multi-year grants to members of its Alliance for Children’s Mental Health ("the Alliance"), as part of the firm’s $50 million commitment to advancing youth mental health solutions. The Alliance brings together leading nonprofits and supports transformative initiatives that strategically address the challenges of stress, anxiety and depression in young people.
